summary: Category image upload feature fully tested and working. Admin can upload images for categories via the admin panel, and these images display correctly on the homepage. All 13 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI verified working.
passed_tests: POST /api/admin/login - Admin login with admin@test.com / Admin123! works correctly
GET /api/admin/categories - Returns both events and pro categories with image field
POST /api/admin/upload-image - Uploads base64 image and returns /api/files/{filename} URL
POST /api/admin/upload-image - Returns 400 when image data is missing
PATCH /api/admin/categories/events/{id}/image - Updates category image for events mode
PATCH /api/admin/categories/pro/{id}/image - Updates category image for pro mode
PATCH /api/admin/categories/{mode}/{id}/image with empty string - Clears category image
GET /api/categories/{mode} - Public endpoint returns categories with image URLs
Admin panel Categories tab - Shows 'Ajouter image' upload areas for all categories
Admin panel Categories tab - Shows both 'Catégories Événements' and 'Catégories Professionnels' sections
Admin panel Categories tab - File input elements present for image upload
HomePage - Categories display with custom uploaded images when available
HomePage - Image URLs prefixed with BACKEND_URL for relative paths (/api/files/...)
critical_code_review_comments: POST /api/admin/upload-image endpoint does not require authentication - consider adding admin auth check for security
Image upload works correctly with base64 encoded images
Category image update endpoint correctly validates mode (events/pro)
HomePage.js correctly prefixes relative image URLs with BACKEND_URL
seed_data_creation: Test images were uploaded and then cleaned up after testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Category image upload feature is fully functional. The admin panel at /admin has a 'Catégories' tab where admins can upload images for each category. The upload flow: 1) Click 'Ajouter image' on a category card, 2) Select an image file, 3) Image is uploaded via POST /api/admin/upload-image, 4) Category is updated via PATCH /api/admin/categories/{mode}/{id}/image. Images display on the homepage with proper URL prefixing.
